section.title: XProject
section.para: XProject, the XML Project Manager, is a tool helping developers to create and manage XML projects. The idea, based on similar tools for other languages, is to use simple conventions and some meta-information on the project in order to automate various common tasks. Those tasks are for e.g. building a package (based on the Packaging System) out of the sources, unit-testing the project (using XSpec test suites), or generating source documentation (based on xqdoc and xquerydoc).
